divs: sighting detailsi walked outside to check out the moon and saw bright orange ball of light low in the sky travellinh towards me. it was coming from the west. grabbed my video camera and yelled formy son and began filming, i posted it on youtube here -- http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=gdikf9vtuca it zoomed right over travelling east and we lost it as it went behind the neighbors house.
